title: SEAFORT / THE DESERTER
description:
Meet the Deserter, gun in hand, by the extinguished fire. 

AUTHORITY  (PSYCHE) red check

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: "The old man stares at the reeds. Hi..."
dialogueTree.text: The old man stares at the reeds. His face shows no emotion -- only a faint tremor passes over his features, like a leaf in the wind.

links.title: The Deserter: "He does not seemingly react to what..."
links.text: He does not seemingly react to what you said. Only his right brow moves a little.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He does not believe a police office..."
links.text: He does not believe a police officer is genuinely revolutionary.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And this was... when?" The lieuten..."
links.text: "And this was... when?" The lieutenant instinctively looks to his notebook, but does not take it out.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He is still not convinced of his sa..."
links.text: He is still not convinced of his safety -- you should not be either.

links.title: You: ""And when was this exactly?""
links.text: "And when was this exactly?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""May the 13th, '08, 44 years ago,"..."
links.text: "May the 13th, '08, 44 years ago," he looks north. "The horizon was black with Coalition airships. Their petroleum rose to the sky and it looked like... like it *formed* the clouds. Storm clouds. When they started shelling it was... dark magic."

links.title: You: ""Dark magic?""
links.text: "Dark magic?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The combined might of internationa..."
links.text: "The combined might of international capital, all at once -- all the greed and terror in the world -- tore into Revachol. It lifted streets from the ground and turned houses into ghosts. We were in the flak tower..." He gestures toward it.

links.title: The Deserter: ""...huddled on the floor. The artil..."
links.text: "...huddled on the floor. The artillery was eighty kilometres away in Ozonne but I *knew*, I knew the Commune would fall. We would all be turned into ash. So I said I was going to the map room..." He looks east.

links.title: Authority: "A terrible shame, still within him...."
links.text: A terrible shame, still within him. The lobes of his ears are red with it, the shame and smallness of what he became.

links.title: You: ""You didn't go to the map room.""
links.text: "You didn't go to the map room."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No. I climbed the chain link acros..."
links.text: "No. I climbed the chain link across the water and hid inland. In the bunkers there, like the weakest of the weak... a mouse. Frightened of the ordnance all night and the sound of the rotors in the morning, whirring -- *thith-thith-thith...*" He looks at the sky.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Airships. Multi-rotored airships us..."
links.text: Airships. Multi-rotored airships used in the Landing.

links.title: You: ""Airships?""
links.text: "Airships?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Aerostatics. The Landing had start..."
links.text: "Aerostatics. The Landing had started. I climbed out -- into hell. There were ships all above. Hissing, whirling, and men pouring out. The chain was submerged so I had to swim back. The fortress was half submerged too, shattered."

links.title: You: ""What was that?""
links.text: "What was that?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Airships. I climbed out." He close..."
links.text: "Airships. I climbed out." He closes his eyes: "Into hell. The Landing was complete. The chain was submerged, I had to swim back. The fortress was half submerged too. Shattered."

links.title: The Deserter: ""They'd all drowned in the lower le..."
links.text: "They'd all drowned in the lower levels, or got torn to shreds above. The anti-aircraft gun had malfunctioned -- so had I. I left them without ideological direction..." He opens his eyes and stares right through you. "It was real. I'd seen it. I'd seen it *in reality*."

links.title: Half Light: "Some kind of great terror. Worse th..."
links.text: Some kind of great terror. Worse than you've ever seen.

links.title: You: ""Seen *what*?""
links.text: "Seen *what*?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The mask of humanity fall from cap..."
links.text: "The mask of humanity fall from capital. It has to take it off to kill everyone -- everything you love; all the hope and tenderness in the world. It has to take it off, just for one second. To do the deed."

links.title: The Deserter: ""And then you see it. As it strangl..."
links.text: "And then you see it. As it strangles and beats your friends to death... the sweetest, most courageous people in the world." He's silent for a second. "You see the fear and power in its eyes. Then you *know*."

links.title: You: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""That the bourgeois are not human.""
links.text: "That the bourgeois are not human."

links.title: You: ""You've lost your mind.""
links.text: "You've lost your mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now is not the time, detective..."..."
links.text: "Now is not the time, detective..." The lieutenant says, gently.

links.title: The Deserter: ""I had to. I *had* to fight it. I c..."
links.text: "I had to. I *had* to fight it. I could not stop anymore..." The old man falls silent. His black eyes keep piercing your skin as he looks to some great distance behind you, shaking his head slowly -- retreating from it.

links.title: You: ""I've always suspected the same..""
links.text: "I've always suspected the same.."

links.title: You: ""That's definitely enough now.""
links.text: "That's definitely enough now."

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Let him finish."
links.text: Say nothing. Let him finish.

links.title: The Deserter: ""I had to, I *had* to fight it. I h..."
links.text: "I had to, I *had* to fight it. I had to never stop..." The old man falls silent. His black eyes keep piercing your skin as he looks to some great distance behind you, shaking his head slowly -- retreating from it.

links.title: You: ""That's definitely enough now.""
links.text: "That's definitely enough now."

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man does not say more. Thos..."
links.text: The old man does not say more. Those black eyes of his keep piercing you, as he looks to some great distance and shakes his head slowly -- retreating from it.

links.title: Conceptualization: "These eyes are charred black by the..."
links.text: These eyes are charred black by the images that have entered them.

links.title: You: ""What then?""
links.text: "What then?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I ran. I climbed the chain link ac..."
links.text: "I ran. I climbed the chain link across the water and hid inland. In the bunkers underground, like the weakest of the weak... a mouse. Frightened of the ordnance all night and the sound of the rotors in the morning, whirring -- *thith-thith-thith...*" He looks at the sky.

links.title: You: ""That's enough. Another thing...""
links.text: "That's enough. Another thing..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's not *enough*," he hisses. "Th..."
links.text: "It's not *enough*," he hisses. "The total, combined power of international capital -- all their fear and terror -- tore into Revachol. Streets rose from the ground... houses turned to ghosts." He gestures erratically, then falls silent.

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""What is it?" The old man looks aro..."
dialogueTree.text: "What is it?" The old man looks around, confused. "What do you want from me? I can't go..."

links.title: Drama: "There was something there -- when h..."
links.text: There was something there -- when he said *talked to her*? He was curious...

links.title: Shivers: "All around you, the air slowly circ..."
links.text: All around you, the air slowly circulates the islet, carrying little swallows and black-beaked seagulls in its slow drift. They all -- every one of them, every bird, mammal, and crustacean...

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Shivers: "Keep their distance."
links.text: Keep their distance.

links.title: You: "Rub your sides."
links.text: Rub your sides.

links.title: Shivers: "The cold dissipates. The old man wa..."
links.text: The cold dissipates. The old man watches you, carefully.

links.title: You: ""When I said I've talked to *her* -..."
links.text: "When I said I've talked to *her* -- you were curious."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've seen kids lose their minds an..."
links.text: "I've seen kids lose their minds and start *talking* to the city. Asking it to *protect* them, when the shelling gets bad. Calling it La Revacholière..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Cities can't talk. It's bourgeois..."
links.text: "Cities can't talk. It's bourgeois idealism... I don't wanna talk about this shit anymore."

links.title: You: "No, he was just confused. Let it go..."
links.text: No, he was just confused. Let it go...

links.title: Drama: "Don't be so sure..."
links.text: Don't be so sure...

links.title: You: ""First, it wasn't *some Samaran shi..."
links.text: "First, it wasn't *some Samaran shit*. It was 'Boy with a Scythe'..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I fucking know what they sang!" he..."
links.text: "I fucking know what they sang!" he hisses. "I watched those little fuckers die in my arms -- little ones came to help us. Got cut to shreds..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You don't fucking tell me what the..."
links.text: "You don't fucking tell me what they sang..." He closes his eyes and exhales to calm himself.

links.title: Composure: "His nostrils are still flaring with..."
links.text: His nostrils are still flaring with rage. He brings himself back under his own stewardship, slowly.

links.title: You: ""La Revacholière... I've heard that..."
links.text: "La Revacholière... I've heard that name, somewhere else. In a dream."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Everyone has. They named a fucking..."
links.text: "Everyone has. They named a fucking perfume after it."

links.title: You: ""No, that's not it. I've talked to..."
links.text: "No, that's not it. I've talked to her."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Talked to *her*?" He raises his bu..."
links.text: "Talked to *her*?" He raises his bushy brow and looks down from the sky -- straight into your bloodshot eye.

links.title: You: ""Yes. I get these... cold spells.""
links.text: "Yes. I get these... cold spells."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's the *drugs* you're all on. Dr..."
links.text: "It's the *drugs* you're all on. Druggies, winos, and whores..." He closes his eyes in disgust.

links.title: You: ""Yes. In the church." (Point southw..."
links.text: "Yes. In the church." (Point southwest.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""God's shithouse." He chortles. "Sh..."
links.text: "God's shithouse." He chortles. "Should've taken it down like they did in Graad; dismantled it for firewood."

links.title: You: ""Nothing. We have serious things to..."
links.text: "Nothing. We have serious things to talk about."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Doubt it, dog...""
links.text: "Doubt it, dog..."

links.title: You: ""Yes. Must've been that.""
links.text: "Yes. Must've been that."

links.title: The Deserter: ""A fucking perfume..." he sighs."
links.text: "A fucking perfume..." he sighs.

links.title: You: ""How does it go -- the song?""
links.text: "How does it go -- the song?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""How did it go..." He looks at his..."
links.text: "How did it go..." He looks at his gun in your hand and shakes his head slowly.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Something about shooting *rabbits,..."
links.text: "Something about shooting *rabbits,* I don't know... I can't remember. It doesn't matter. It's gone now."

links.title: Composure: "He waves erratically -- with his ha..."
links.text: He waves erratically -- with his hand, annoyed that he can't remember. A little tremor passes through him.

links.title: Empathy: "It was dear to him. He resents forg..."
links.text: It was dear to him. He resents forgetting it.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "'So if I can shoot rabbits then I c..."
links.text: 'So if I can shoot rabbits then I can shoot fascists too' -- those are the next lines.

links.title: You: ""So if I can shoot rabbits, then I..."
links.text: "So if I can shoot rabbits, then I can shoot fascists too."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What are you talking about?" He sq..."
links.text: "What are you talking about?" He squints and looks you straight in the eye -- two black beads, moist from the sea air.

links.title: Logic: "He doesn't recognize it."
links.text: He doesn't recognize it.

links.title: The Deserter: ""How did it go..." He looks at his..."
links.text: "How did it go..." He looks at his gun on the ground and shakes his head slowly.

links.title: You: ""Thank you for clearing that up." (..."
links.text: "Thank you for clearing that up." (Conclude.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Heh". The old man squints and look..."
links.text: "Heh". The old man squints and looks you straight in the eye -- two black beads, moist from the sea air.

links.title: Composure: "Something is very wrong with him no..."
links.text: Something is very wrong with him now.

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: "The old man stares despondently at..."
dialogueTree.text: The old man stares despondently at the logs. It's like he's forgotten you're there...

links.title: You: ""When did you first see the decease..."
links.text: "When did you first see the deceased?"

links.title: You: ""What, specifically, did you not *l..."
links.text: "What, specifically, did you not *like* about what you saw the night of the murder?"

links.title: You: ""Murderers. I know what you mean.""
links.text: "Murderers. I know what you mean."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You *don't* know. You haven't seen..."
links.text: "You *don't* know. You haven't seen it..." He shakes his head, slowly. "Iblis..."

links.title: You: ""Iblis?""
links.text: "Iblis?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The black-eyed angel," he nods."
links.text: "The black-eyed angel," he nods.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Sha'i'tan, Ahura, The Darkened One."
links.text: Sha'i'tan, Ahura, The Darkened One.

links.title: You: ""Understood -- Iblis.""
links.text: "Understood -- Iblis."

links.title: The Deserter: "He nods."
links.text: He nods.

links.title: You: ""Been looking at anything else you..."
links.text: "Been looking at anything else you haven't *liked*?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're with the RCM --" He waves i..."
links.text: "You're with the RCM --" He waves in your general direction. "The Coalition-appointed mob that enforces bourgeois morals in Revachol. A so-called 'lieutenant double-yefreitor'..."

links.title: You: ""I'm not 'Coalition-appointed.' I j..."
links.text: "I'm not 'Coalition-appointed.' I just try to help people."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're the RCM." He stares at you..."
links.text: "You're the RCM." He stares at you coldly. "You represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Take me to them as a prisoner of w..."
links.text: "Take me to them as a prisoner of war. I have relinquished my weapon, I can no longer serve. No superiors can relieve me of my duty, you bulldozed them all to a mass grave for trying to free humanity..." His hand shakes and he breaks into a coughing fit.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A spray of blood from his mouth, on..."
links.text: A spray of blood from his mouth, on the black charcoal in the firepit...

links.title: Rhetoric: "René, the royalist on the coast sai..."
links.text: René, the royalist on the coast said...

links.title: You: ""You never signed the Revacholian I..."
links.text: "You never signed the Revacholian Instrument of Surrender..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Liberal reactionaries signed that..."
links.text: "Liberal reactionaries signed that instrument -- traitors, who should have been burned alive..." He draws his breath. "I answer to the Communist Party."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is that part of why you've been he..."
links.text: "Is that part of why you've been here all this time? Because the Party didn't surrender?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""If the Party had surrendered -- th..."
links.text: "If the Party had surrendered -- then it would not be the Party."

links.title: You: ""Honourable.""
links.text: "Honourable."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Honour is a feudal atavism." He lo..."
links.text: "Honour is a feudal atavism." He looks at the firepit. "My motive is class."

links.title: You: ""That's insane.""
links.text: "That's insane."

links.title: The Deserter: ""*You're* insane." He stares at the..."
links.text: "*You're* insane." He stares at the firepit. "Radio shows, speed racing, sporting goods... None of it is real."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I don't think you did." He stares..."
links.text: "I don't think you did." He stares at the firepit. "You live in a delusion. Radio shows, speed racing, and sporting goods. It's not real..."

links.title: You: ""Is *that* why you've been here for..."
links.text: "Is *that* why you've been here for 43 years? Because the Party didn't surrender?"

links.title: You: ""The communards signed the Revachol..."
links.text: "The communards signed the Revacholian Instrument of Surrender."

links.title: You: ""Before that, tell me...""
links.text: "Before that, tell me..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What?" The old man looks up -- the..."
links.text: "What?" The old man looks up -- the whites of his eyes are pale yellow.

links.title: You: ""That's right. I'm with the good gu..."
links.text: "That's right. I'm with the good guys."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Murderers..." He stares at the emb..."
links.text: "Murderers..." He stares at the embers, then into your eyes. "You're the RCM -- you represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

links.title: You: ""We enforce the law. We keep these..."
links.text: "We enforce the law. We keep these animals from killing each other."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're the RCM." He stares at the..."
links.text: "You're the RCM." He stares at the embers, then into your eyes. "You represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

links.title: You: ""I know what it looks like. But I h..."
links.text: "I know what it looks like. But I have secret plans to turn the RCM into a Mazovian revolutionary unit."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Rock and roll posturing..." He sta..."
links.text: "Rock and roll posturing..." He stares at the embers, then into your eyes. "You're the RCM -- you represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

links.title: You: ""I'm with the RCM -- let's leave it..."
links.text: "I'm with the RCM -- let's leave it at that."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Let's." He looks you in the eye. "..."
links.text: "Let's." He looks you in the eye. "You represent the Moralist International, the enemies of humanity, who took this city. I represent their adversary, le Parti communiste d'Insulinde."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're with the RCM --" He waves i..."
links.text: "You're with the RCM --" He waves in your general direction. "The Coalition-appointed mob that oversees the occupation of Revachol. A so-called 'lieutenant'..."

links.title: You: ""I want to ask again about the peop..."
links.text: "I want to ask again about the people you don't like."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The boat engine." He gestures nort..."
links.text: "The boat engine." He gestures north. "On the water..."

links.title: You: ""Those words: 'the future teaches y..."
links.text: "Those words: 'the future teaches you...'"

links.title: The Deserter: ""*Real music, real proletkult*." He..."
links.text: "*Real music, real proletkult*." He nods. "That's La Revacholière, not your rock-and-roll misanthropy. *Chanson de soldat* of the black-and-whites."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Marching song..."
links.text: Marching song...

links.title: Authority: "Forget about that for a moment. You..."
links.text: Forget about that for a moment. You need to address that remark first.

links.title: You: ""I'm not a misanthrope, I'm a half-..."
links.text: "I'm not a misanthrope, I'm a half-dead police officer who's just doing his job."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The job of a shit-licker.""
links.text: "The job of a shit-licker."

links.title: You: ""I'm not a shit-licking boujee dog...."
links.text: "I'm not a shit-licking boujee dog. I'm a half-dead police officer who's just doing his job."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The job of a boujee dog.""
links.text: "The job of a boujee dog."

links.title: You: ""I know La Revacholière. It's the m..."
links.text: "I know La Revacholière. It's the marching song of the World Revolution."

links.title: The Deserter: ""There you go." His eyes remain fix..."
links.text: "There you go." His eyes remain fixed on the sky as he sighs and adds: "One of three."

links.title: The Deserter: ""In Graad they sang 'Brave Children..."
links.text: "In Graad they sang 'Brave Children, Favourites of History' and in Hsin-Yao it was..." He struggles to remember, then gives up. "...some Samaran shit, I guess."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "In Hsin-Yao they sang "Boy with a S..."
links.text: In Hsin-Yao they sang "Boy with a Scythe / Golden Sun."

links.title: You: ""What is La Revacholière?""
links.text: "What is La Revacholière?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It is the anthem of the World Revo..."
links.text: "It is the anthem of the World Revolution." His eyes remain fixed on the sky. "One of three."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You don't understand *anything*."..."
links.text: "You don't understand *anything*." The old man squints at you -- you see two black beads, gleaming.

links.title: Authority: "You need to address that remark."
links.text: You need to address that remark.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Real music. It's La Revacholière,..."
links.text: "Real music. It's La Revacholière, you shit-licking boujee dog. *Chanson de soldat* of the black-and-whites."

links.title: You: "Pick up the gun lying in the sand."
links.text: Pick up the gun lying in the sand.

links.title: The Deserter: "His gaze follows your motions. The..."
links.text: His gaze follows your motions. The rifle feels surprisingly light in your hand, frame stocked and patched in places with tape and wire.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Still warm from his parched hands...."
links.text: Still warm from his parched hands. Not the metal. The metal is ice cold. This weapon has been modified several times.

links.title: You: "Inspect it closer."
links.text: Inspect it closer.

links.title: The Deserter: "The rifle's in a shabby state, like..."
links.text: The rifle's in a shabby state, like a crutch that's seen too much travel. Hieroglyphs are embossed into the forearm made of walnut.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "They say: 'Triangong 4.46. Hsin-Yao..."
links.text: They say: 'Triangong 4.46. Hsin-Yao Commune. For Safre -- and for all mankind.'

links.title: You: "I know Seraise?"
links.text: I know Seraise?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "This is Vulgate Seraise. You can ba..."
links.text: This is Vulgate Seraise. You can barely intuit the words. *Know* is stretching it.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Cuno, I know Seraise.""
links.text: (Whisper.) "Cuno, I know Seraise."

links.title: Cuno: ""Supercool. What's it say?" He soun..."
links.text: "Supercool. What's it say?" He sounds incredulous.

links.title: You: ""For Safre -- and for all mankind.""
links.text: "For Safre -- and for all mankind."

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Kim, I know Seraise.""
links.text: (Whisper.) "Kim, I know Seraise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What does it say?" he asks doubtfu..."
links.text: "What does it say?" he asks doubtfully.

links.title: You: ""For Safre -- and for all mankind?""
links.text: "For Safre -- and for all mankind?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""That's what the little guys told u..."
links.text: "That's what the little guys told us." The old man says silently. "Every day at 4 o'clock in the morning, they'd go on and on about their Safre, their mankind, and Mazov..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Those men were commandos. They wer..."
links.text: "Those men were commandos. They weren't shit on a stick, like us. They were small and..." He doesn't say more. The thought dissipates on his lips.

links.title: You: "Look at the butt of the gun."
links.text: Look at the butt of the gun.

links.title: The Deserter: "On the butt you see Vespertine writ..."
links.text: On the butt you see Vespertine writing, burnt into the wood: Triangong 4.46 mm, made in Hsin-Yao.

links.title: You: ""It's as he said: it's a Triangong...."
links.text: "It's as he said: it's a Triangong. Made in Hsin-Yao."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No one said it has to be a Belle-M..."
links.text: "No one said it has to be a Belle-Magrave..." The lieutenant does not take his eyes off the old man. "We were just guessing."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "From ballistics, it could easily ha..."
links.text: From ballistics, it could easily have been a Triangong too.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It doesn't matter if it was made i..."
links.text: "It doesn't matter if it was made in Shantih-Shantih. All it has to do is use jacketed ammunition. And it does."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Worn. Personalized even. Looks lik..."
links.text: "Worn. Personalized even. Looks like this weapon has seen a lot of use. Hasn't it, sir?"

links.title: Cuno: ""This guy's smoked a lot of people..."
links.text: "This guy's smoked a lot of people with this, huh?"

links.title: The Deserter: "No response from the old man. The p..."
links.text: No response from the old man. The plastic cape around his shoulders rustles in a small bout of wind.

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man blinks slowly. A strang..."
links.text: The old man blinks slowly. A strange jitter comes over him, he pushes his right leg down and does not reply.

links.title: You: ""This is a Triangong, made in Hsin-..."
links.text: "This is a Triangong, made in Hsin-Yao."

links.title: You: ""This uses jacketed ammunition. 4.4..."
links.text: "This uses jacketed ammunition. 4.46."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The right type and the right calib..."
links.text: "The right type and the right calibre," the lieutenant nods -- glancing at the gun.

links.title: Empathy: "He's liking this."
links.text: He's liking this.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Jacketed -- military-grade ammunit..."
links.text: "Jacketed -- military-grade ammunition. Stable in flight, good for hitting something that's very, very far away..." He says -- mostly to the old man.

links.title: Empathy: "As he speaks, he stresses every wor..."
links.text: As he speaks, he stresses every word. He's liking this.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Hmhm." The old man smacks his lips..."
links.text: "Hmhm." The old man smacks his lips.

links.title: You: ""The rifle has been patched and mod..."
links.text: "The rifle has been patched and modified several times."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wonder how old it is.""
links.text: "I wonder how old it is."

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man does not answer. He jus..."
links.text: The old man does not answer. He just stares in front of him.

links.title: Cuno: ""Looks like old shit.""
links.text: "Looks like old shit."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Things keep falling apart if you d..."
links.text: "Things keep falling apart if you don't tend to them."

links.title: You: "Stow the gun. (Conclude.)"
links.text: Stow the gun. (Conclude.)

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man keeps following your mo..."
links.text: The old man keeps following your motions with his gaze. His right arm twitches suddenly...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Some kind of involuntary response?..."
links.text: Some kind of involuntary response? Something is slightly off with his motorics...

links.title: Rhetoric: "This looked very much like the murd..."
links.text: This looked very much like the murder weapon. It can be used against him -- later.

links.title: Rhetoric: "This looked very much like the murd..."
links.text: This looked very much like the murder weapon. It can be used against him to get a confession -- in time...

links.title: You: ""Who are you?""
links.text: "Who are you?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""My name..." He looks across the wa..."
links.text: "My name..." He looks across the water, then back at you: "...is Iosef Lilianovich Dros, Political Commissar of the 114th Anti-Aircraft Division of the 4th Army of the Commune of Revachol."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I am a deserter, a partisan, and a..."
links.text: "I am a deserter, a partisan, and a prisoner of war. This is my termless surrender." His eyes turn to the reeds again, dead and dull.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "There, behind them, across the Delt..."
links.text: There, behind them, across the Delta -- the INSURCOM building. Coalition Government Insulindian Mission Control.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Commune of Revachol..." The li..."
links.text: "The Commune of Revachol..." The lieutenant forgets to close his mouth. "Do you mean the ICM? You're a holdover from the..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""From the Insulindian Citizens Mili..."
links.text: "From the Insulindian Citizens Militia -- the Army of the Revolution. I was recruited in Jamrock in '07, trained in the Ecole de Contrôle Aérien and consigned to emergency defence duties in '08."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I left my unit on the eve of the L..."
links.text: "I left my unit on the eve of the Landing. When I returned here on May 14th the Commune had fallen. Still armed -- and *ideologically trained* -- I wrote a criticism of myself. And resumed partisan duties."

links.title: You: ""You've been on this island for 43..."
links.text: "You've been on this island for 43 years?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""No." He looks into the fire -- a w..."
links.text: "No." He looks into the fire -- a wisp of smoke rises from somewhere between the charred logs. "I've been on other islands too."

links.title: You: ""How long have you been on this isl..."
links.text: "How long have you been on this island?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Forty-three years... No." He looks..."
links.text: "Forty-three years... No." He looks into the fire -- a wisp of smoke rises from somewhere between the charred logs. "I've been on other islands too."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I was on Résurrection until they t..."
links.text: "I was on Résurrection until they turned it into a *spa* in '18. Then I was on E48, a nameless sound, until the sea washed over it. Then I came back here. That was..." He thinks. "Twenty-two years ago."

links.title: Cuno: ""Wait-wait!" he turns to you, mouth..."
links.text: "Wait-wait!" he turns to you, mouth open. "Like the fucking... *ancient* army?"

links.title: You: ""You're a holdover from, the ICM, t..."
links.text: "You're a holdover from, the ICM, the Insulindian Citizens Militia?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes. Recruited from Jamrock in '07..."
links.text: "Yes. Recruited from Jamrock in '07, trained in the Ecole de Contrôle Aérien; consigned to emergency defence duties in '08."

links.title: You: ""You're a holdover from the Army of..."
links.text: "You're a holdover from the Army of the Commune of Revachol?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes, I am from the Insulindian Cit..."
links.text: "Yes, I am from the Insulindian Citizens Militia. Recruited from Jamrock in '07, trained in the Ecole de Contrôle Aérien; consigned to emergency defence duties in '08."

links.title: You: ""One more time, Mr. Dros -- the Col..."
links.text: "One more time, Mr. Dros -- the Colonel. We need to talk about you *killing* him."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Hmhm." His leg jerks."
links.text: "Hmhm." His leg jerks.

links.title: You: ""Again -- you've been hiding here f..."
links.text: "Again -- you've been hiding here for *43 years*?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Forty-three years and 10 months.""
links.text: "Forty-three years and 10 months."

links.title: You: ""That's insane.""
links.text: "That's insane."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's not how a human being should..."
links.text: "It's not how a human being should live, but I had to..." He grimaces, clearly in pain. "...I couldn't just forget. I couldn't just forget what I saw."

links.title: Volition: "He just *couldn't*..."
links.text: He just *couldn't*...

links.title: You: ""That's steadfast.""
links.text: "That's steadfast."

links.title: You: ""That's the length of my entire lif..."
links.text: "That's the length of my entire life."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's too long. It's not how a huma..."
links.text: "It's too long. It's not how a human being should live..." He grimaces, clearly in pain. "But I couldn't just forget what I saw."

links.title: You: ""I don't even know what that is.""
links.text: "I don't even know what that is."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's inhuman. It's sick. It's not..."
links.text: "It's inhuman. It's sick. It's not how a human being should live, but I had to..." He grimaces, clearly in pain. "I couldn't just forget. I couldn't just forget what I saw."

links.title: You: ""You said you deserted your unit?""
links.text: "You said you deserted your unit?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I was just sixteen years old, fift..."
links.text: "I was just sixteen years old, fifteen when I volunteered. I had a lapse of faith..." He clears his throat. "And of courage too."

links.title: You: ""Lapse of faith?""
links.text: "Lapse of faith?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""You could say I misunderstood the..."
links.text: "You could say I misunderstood the historic role of the proletariat, and thought Mazovian socio-economics were fallible. For a second I doubted the irreducible laws of historic materialism."

links.title: The Deserter: ""A second is all it took.""
links.text: "A second is all it took."

links.title: You: ""For what?""
links.text: "For what?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""For Reaction to take hold.""
links.text: "For Reaction to take hold."

links.title: You: ""What's Reaction?""
links.text: "What's Reaction?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Petty-bourgeois terror. It's in al..."
links.text: "Petty-bourgeois terror. It's in all men."

links.title: You: ""It wasn't Reaction -- you were jus..."
links.text: "It wasn't Reaction -- you were just afraid."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's the same thing... you haven't..."
links.text: "It's the same thing... you haven't seen *it*. Not really -- not naked. It's impossible not to be afraid."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It remains unclear what *it* is. He..."
links.text: It remains unclear what *it* is. He makes leaps he doesn't expect you to follow.

links.title: You: ""Yes. We all have a tiny bourgeois..."
links.text: "Yes. We all have a tiny bourgeois person in us, trying to run away."

links.title: You: ""I understand. Communists are natur..."
links.text: "I understand. Communists are natural cowards. Quantity over quality."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You haven't seen *it*. The face of..."
links.text: "You haven't seen *it*. The face of who you serve -- naked. It's impossible not to be afraid."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Well done. I won't explain it to a..."
links.text: "Well done. I won't explain it to a minion of capital."

links.title: You: ""What is this place? This island...""
links.text: "What is this place? This island..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's not an island, droite." He lo..."
links.text: "It's not an island, droite." He looks around. "It's a defensive fortification of the Commune of Revachol and I am its last surviving defender."

links.title: You: ""What was it used for?""
links.text: "What was it used for?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The congenitally deformed King Fil..."
links.text: "The congenitally deformed King Filippe II built it to restrict access to the Bay of Revachol. We captured it in '02, retrofitted the fort with an AA gun to defend against an airborne landing -- against the whole world."

links.title: You: ""Airborne landing?""
links.text: "Airborne landing?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""*The* Landing. Coalition military..."
links.text: "*The* Landing. Coalition military called it 'Operation Death Blow.'" He winces. "I later found out, on the radio -- they called it..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""*Death Blow*. You're one of them...."
links.text: "*Death Blow*. You're one of them. Tell me, who speaks like that? We had 50 million people on Caillou alone..."

links.title: You: ""First, I'm not *one of them*.""
links.text: "First, I'm not *one of them*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Sure you are, you're RCM. Answer m..."
links.text: "Sure you are, you're RCM. Answer me -- who calls an operation against 50 million people *Death Blow*?"

links.title: You: ""Coalition military.""
links.text: "Coalition military."

links.title: The Deserter: "He shakes his head and says: "Iblis..."
links.text: He shakes his head and says: "Iblis."

links.title: You: ""Someone who's come to end this mad..."
links.text: "Someone who's come to end this madness."

links.title: You: ""Tell me something else.""
links.text: "Tell me something else."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No." He shakes his head: "Iblis --..."
links.text: "No." He shakes his head: "Iblis -- Iblis calls it that."

links.title: You: ""You mean the Landing? Retaking of..."
links.text: "You mean the Landing? Retaking of Revachol?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Coalition military called it Opera..."
links.text: "Coalition military called it Operation *Death Blow*." He winces. "I later found out, on the radio. They called it..."

links.title: You: ""Understood." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "Understood." (Conclude.)

links.title: You: ""How have you survived all this tim..."
links.text: "How have you survived all this time?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""How does anyone survive?" He looks..."
links.text: "How does anyone survive?" He looks at his worn running shoes. "I *steal*."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Now hold on there..."
links.text: Now hold on there...

links.title: You: ""That's a *choice*. You could have..."
links.text: "That's a *choice*. You could have become self-employed. Create the system."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're insane and grotesque. Every..."
links.text: "You're insane and grotesque. Everyone steals: vegetables, supplies. It's the life of a dog." He coughs once more, then puts his hand on his belly...

links.title: You: ""What do you steal?""
links.text: "What do you steal?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Supplies, vegetables..." He winces..."
links.text: "Supplies, vegetables..." He winces. "I collect rainwater. It's the life of a dog, not a human being." He coughs once more, then puts his hand on his belly...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How is your health, Mr. Dros?""
links.text: "How is your health, Mr. Dros?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've been throwing up blood since..."
links.text: "I've been throwing up blood since winter. Red, like beet root -- been passing it in stool too..."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He does seem frail, gaunt for his a..."
links.text: He does seem frail, gaunt for his age, more like 75 than 65. Trouble putting on weight could mean cancer.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM can provide medical servic..."
links.text: "The RCM can provide medical services. You need to be looked over."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I *need* to die." A droll smile st..."
links.text: "I *need* to die." A droll smile stretches across his mouth. "You don't have medical facilities, you have guns. That's all they give you, toy guns."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You also have Drouamine."
links.text: You also have Drouamine.

links.title: You: ""We have *drouamine*. And other opi..."
links.text: "We have *drouamine*. And other opioid based painkillers. You must be in pain."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I *have* been running out of that..."
links.text: "I *have* been running out of that stuff..." A light goes on in his eyes. He smacks his dry lips.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "There's no way he could manage the..."
links.text: There's no way he could manage the pain without them. It's safe to say he is addicted to painkillers by now.

links.title: You: ""You like that drouamine, don't you?""
links.text: "You like that drouamine, don't you?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's the little joys..." A crooked..."
links.text: "It's the little joys..." A crooked smile appears on his face. "A dark joke. A sunshiny day. Morphine..."

links.title: You: ""This is a serious situation. You n..."
links.text: "This is a serious situation. You need to be looked over and we can do it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""There's nothing to look over. The..."
links.text: "There's nothing to look over. The triage is in and it's black. Administer morphine. Moribund."

links.title: You: ""How have you coped -- mentally?""
links.text: "How have you coped -- mentally?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I haven't. I have holes in my brai..."
links.text: "I haven't. I have holes in my brain. Years missing, others filled with pain only. A decade of..." His eyes roll into his skull and back...

links.title: The Deserter: ""I don't even know what... *Inferno..."
links.text: "I don't even know what... *Inferno*?"

links.title: You: "(Nod appreciatively.) "I also live..."
links.text: (Nod appreciatively.) "I also live in Hell."

links.title: The Deserter: ""At least you know it." He nods tow..."
links.text: "At least you know it." He nods toward Martinaise. "The traitors of this city turned the lights back on in the Thirties, after the fighting stopped. Ruins, glittering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's disgusting..." He looks down..."
links.text: "It's disgusting..." He looks down at his shoes; his face parched from the sun and the wind -- there's a wince of pain in there somewhere.

links.title: Empathy: "Are they not heartbroken? How could..."
links.text: Are they not heartbroken? How could they have moved on?

links.title: You: ""I also have holes in my brain." (P..."
links.text: "I also have holes in my brain." (Point to your head.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""No wonder. All your minds are rott..."
links.text: "No wonder. All your minds are rotting from the radio waves..." He nods toward Martinaise. "I watched the *traitors* of this city turn the lights back on. More and more each year. Ruins, glittering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

links.title: You: "(You notice the lieutenant is about..."
links.text: (You notice the lieutenant is about to say something.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would imagine it gets tremendous..."
links.text: "I would imagine it gets tremendously difficult -- mentally -- to live in isolation."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Traitors. It's better alone." He n..."
links.text: "Traitors. It's better alone." He nods toward Martinaise. "I watched the people of this city turn the lights back on, more and more each year. Ruins, glimmering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno could do this shit. Live all..."
links.text: "Cuno could do this shit. Live all alone like this. Cuno could hack it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Good, *Cuno*. Be that." He nods to..."
links.text: "Good, *Cuno*. Be that." He nods toward Martinaise. "I saw the *traitors* of this city turn the lights back on. More and more each year. Ruins, glittering in the dark, like a fucking merry-go-round..."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for clearing that up." (..."
links.text: "Thank you for clearing that up." (Conclude.)

links.title: The Deserter: "He looks at you, his face parched f..."
links.text: He looks at you, his face parched from the sun and the wind -- there's a wince of pain in there somewhere.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's dad has this shit. Wine bel..."
links.text: "Cuno's dad has this shit. Wine belly." The kid looks at you. "The cops can take care of this, right? Medicine shit. With, like, facilities."

links.title: You: ""The police can give you medical se..."
links.text: "The police can give you medical services. You need to be looked over."

links.title: You: ""That's what you get stealing thing..."
links.text: "That's what you get stealing things."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes." There's a smile on his dry l..."
links.text: "Yes." There's a smile on his dry lips. "That is true, droite. That is true. That's the punishment in the jungle."

links.title: You: ""How is your health?""
links.text: "How is your health?"

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: The Deserter: "He coughs, then looks to his feet,..."
links.text: He coughs, then looks to his feet, suddenly despondent.

links.title: You: ""How have you concealed yourself al..."
links.text: "How have you concealed yourself all these years?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It was hard in the '10s..." He sha..."
links.text: "It was hard in the '10s..." He shakes his head. "I didn't have partisan training, they were searching for stragglers, those bloodhounds..." He closes his eyes. "Floodlights on the water at night."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There were posters. Campaigns.""
links.text: "There were posters. Campaigns."

links.title: The Deserter: ""We communards still hoped and they..."
links.text: "We communards still hoped and they needed to snuff that hope out. The East capitulated, Martinaise and Coal City were turned to dust..." He looks south. "But Jamrock, Faubourg, even Couron; and Boogie Street of course -- those fucking kipts had Mazov coursing through their veins..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""And others too. Some cordons of Re..."
links.text: "And others too. Some cordons of Revachol were still fighting. There were cells, I tried to contact them..." He shakes his head. "Soon they all went silent. The frequencies, dead."

links.title: You: ""How did you get between here and t..."
links.text: "How did you get between here and the mainland?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""At night. I used a dinghy..." He n..."
links.text: "At night. I used a dinghy..." He nods toward the deflated tyre in the reeds. "I only went after dark then. When I got to the city I stayed underground. Patrols. You lot. The commons too, they'd started snitching..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the city you move underground?""
links.text: "In the city you move underground?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""From bunker to bunker..." He nods...."
links.text: "From bunker to bunker..." He nods. "Not anymore, no one cares now, I don't even have to hide. They think I'm another antisocial vagrant. I could walk straight into that town if I wanted. I just..." He falls silent, his gaze fixed on the shacks huddled together across the water.

links.title: You: ""So in the city you move... undergr..."
links.text: "So in the city you move... underground?"

links.title: You: ""What was it like?""
links.text: "What was it like?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""What was it like? There was hope,..."
links.text: "What was it like? There was hope, a little hope. They needed to snuff it out. Martinaise and Coal City were turned to dust..." He looks south. "But Jamrock, Faubourg, even Couron; and Boogie Street of course -- those fucking kipts had Kras Mazov coursing in their veins..."

links.title: You: ""Another thing...""
links.text: "Another thing..."

links.title: The Deserter: "He opens his eyes and looks at some..."
links.text: He opens his eyes and looks at something, to your left... then at you.

links.title: You: ""You said this is your *termless su..."
links.text: "You said this is your *termless surrender*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're with the RCM --" He waves i..."
links.text: "You're with the RCM --" He waves in your general direction. "The Coalition-appointed mob that enforces bourgeois morals in Revachol."

links.title: You: ""So you're a communist soldier? Fro..."
links.text: "So you're a communist soldier? From the communist army?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""No, I am not a soldier. I am an id..."
links.text: "No, I am not a soldier. I am an ideological officer -- I belong to the Party, not the Army."

links.title: You: ""But you said you were trained and..."
links.text: "But you said you were trained and assigned to the Defence Corps."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Trained," he nods, "in *historical..."
links.text: "Trained," he nods, "in *historical materialism*, then assigned as a *political commissar*. By the Party. These things used to mean something."

links.title: You: ""Wait, what does a 'political commi..."
links.text: "Wait, what does a 'political commissar' do?"

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man does not answer. He til..."
links.text: The old man does not answer. He tilts his silver head and looks at the reeds -- you see a small tremor pass through his legs.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""His job was to assure the army ans..."
links.text: "His job was to assure the army answers to civilian control -- and follows the ideology of the commune," the lieutenant says softly.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Scientific communism!" The tracksu..."
links.text: "Scientific communism!" The tracksuit-clad old man is suddenly reanimated. "A *comissaire politique* is a knight-philosopher of the Revolution, a future human."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Awakened from shutdown by the promi..."
links.text: Awakened from shutdown by the promise of *ideology*.

links.title: Inland Empire: "He was like a cleric, a shepherd."
links.text: He was like a cleric, a shepherd.

links.title: You: ""So you were like a priest?""
links.text: "So you were like a priest?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""No..." He shakes his head. "The *o..."
links.text: "No..." He shakes his head. "The *opposite* of that. A future human, not a human of the past."

links.title: You: "Really now?"
links.text: Really now?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Okay then. Over-mystified that a bi..."
links.text: Okay then. Over-mystified that a bit..

links.title: Cuno: ""My pig asked you a question. Quit..."
links.text: "My pig asked you a question. Quit spazzin' out and tell him about the..." The kid doesn't get to finish the sentence.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He would answer, but something happ..."
links.text: He would answer, but something happened. It's like his tape cut off suddenly...

links.title: You: ""That means you're a trained commun..."
links.text: "That means you're a trained communist, right?"

links.title: The Deserter: "He nods slowly. Then another tremor..."
links.text: He nods slowly. Then another tremor.

links.title: You: "(Point to yourself.) "I'm also a co..."
links.text: (Point to yourself.) "I'm also a communist."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No you're not." He coughs. "You're..."
links.text: "No you're not." He coughs. "You're a *liberast*."
You should engage him about inframaterialism. Impress him with all the *ideas* you picked up from the reading group.
No, don't. This man does not subscribe to intellectual daydreams. The communism he mourns is a planetary force.

links.title: You: ""Liberast?""
links.text: "Liberast?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""A liberal and a pederast. It's wha..."
links.text: "A liberal and a pederast. It's what most liberals are."

links.title: You: ""Yep -- that's me.""
links.text: "Yep -- that's me."

links.title: You: ""I'm not a liberal. I told you I'm..."
links.text: "I'm not a liberal. I told you I'm a communist."

links.title: You: ""No, I really am a communist. I hav..."
links.text: "No, I really am a communist. I have communist thoughts in my head."

links.title: The Deserter: ""All the real communists are dead...."
links.text: "All the real communists are dead. They died fighting for *communism* -- are you *dead*?" His voice turns into a hiss: "No. You're an inert lumpen with a gun."

links.title: You: ""Okay maybe I'm not.""
links.text: "Okay maybe I'm not."

links.title: You: ""I'm a nationalist by the way.""
links.text: "I'm a nationalist by the way."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're a lumpen with a gun." He lo..."
links.text: "You're a lumpen with a gun." He looks away.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective." The lieutenant gives y..."
links.text: "Detective." The lieutenant gives you a stern look. "We have not come here to discuss ideology." He then turns to the old man.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have come to ask questions rega..."
links.text: "We have come to ask questions regarding a murder investigation."

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man spits into the fire pit..."
links.text: The old man spits into the fire pit. He does not say anything more. A jitter passes his lower body...

links.title: Composure: "The expression on his face is unrea..."
links.text: The expression on his face is unreadable. There's some sort of interference there... neurological?

links.title: Endurance: "There's definitely something off wi..."
links.text: There's definitely something off with his body. Something more than just metabolism, or even cancer...

links.title: Endurance: "There's definitely something off wi..."
links.text: There's definitely something off with his body. Something more than just metabolism...

links.title: You: ""By the way, I'm a fascist.""
links.text: "By the way, I'm a fascist."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're not. You're part of the mea..."
links.text: "You're not. You're part of the meat shield surrounding the *real* fascists, while they rape children. That's what *you* are."

links.title: You: "(Point to yourself.) "I'm a moralis..."
links.text: (Point to yourself.) "I'm a moralist."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No you're not. You're part of the..."
links.text: "No you're not. You're part of the *meat shield*." He squints. "The human shield that surrounds the fascists. While they kill and rape. That's what *you* are."

links.title: You: ""I'm a revolutionary too. Today the..."
links.text: "I'm a revolutionary too. Today the real revolutionizing is done by entrepreneurs."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're part of the *meat shield*."..."
links.text: "You're part of the *meat shield*." He squints. "The human meat shield that surrounds the fascists and the license holders. You take the fire, while they rape and kill. That's what *you* are."

links.title: You: ""I'm not really into politics mysel..."
links.text: "I'm not really into politics myself."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're inert lumpen with a gun.""
links.text: "You're inert lumpen with a gun."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: The Deserter: "He looks away, to the sea, and lets..."
links.text: He looks away, to the sea, and lets out a cough.

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Like you belong to the Moralist Pa..."
links.text: "Like you belong to the Moralist Party..." He squints his eyes at you.

links.title: You: ""I have another, serious question f..."
links.text: "I have another, serious question for you."

links.title: The Deserter: ""There is nothing serious in this w..."
links.text: "There is nothing serious in this world." He looks at the gun in your hand. "It's a farce."

links.title: The Deserter: ""There is nothing serious in this w..."
links.text: "There is nothing serious in this world." He looks at the gun lying on the ground. "It's a farce."

links.title: You: ""What have you been using this gun..."
links.text: "What have you been using this gun for?"

links.title: The Deserter: "He scoffs. The corner of his black..."
links.text: He scoffs. The corner of his black eye twitches. He does not reply to the command.

links.title: Empathy: "He is not afraid of such displays...."
links.text: He is not afraid of such displays. This was the wrong move...

links.title: You: ""Put the weapon down, NOW!""
links.text: "Put the weapon down, NOW!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking NOW!""
links.text: "Fucking NOW!"

links.title: You: ""You don't even have a magazine.""
links.text: "You don't even have a magazine."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're right. It's a good thing I..."
links.text: "You're right. It's a good thing I got one in the chamber."

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh, wait. Yes."
links.text: Oh, wait. Yes.

links.title: Drama: "Look at him raise his bushy brows...."
links.text: Look at him raise his bushy brows. That's a lie. He's empty.

links.title: You: ""I *am* an enemy commander of rank..."
links.text: "I *am* an enemy commander of rank -- put it down."

links.title: Authority: "The words "I *am* an enemy commande..."
links.text: The words "I *am* an enemy commander" sound cold as iron from your lungs. The old man still hugs his gun...

links.title: The Deserter: ""And what rank would that be, dog?""
links.text: "And what rank would that be, dog?"

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant.""
links.text: "Lieutenant."

links.title: The Deserter: ""A big wheel of the 4th Regiment of..."
links.text: "A big wheel of the 4th Regiment of the pederast army." He sighs. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway...."

links.title: Drama: "You were right."
links.text: You were right.

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant-Yefreitor.""
links.text: "Lieutenant-Yefreitor."

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor.""
links.text: "Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor."

links.title: Authority: "It's a good line, but your voice sl..."
links.text: It's a good line, but your voice slips on *commander*, producing a little squeak. Sounds like you're afraid.

links.title: You: ""Well, guess what? I *am* an enemy..."
links.text: "Well, guess what? I *am* an enemy commander."

links.title: The Deserter: ""A big time operator of the pederas..."
links.text: "A big time operator of the pederast army. How about I keep it, huh? Hand it over to a real killer. A *briscade*."

links.title: You: ""I'm not from the homo army.""
links.text: "I'm not from the homo army."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No one cares, droite." He shakes h..."
links.text: "No one cares, droite." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""What's a *briscade*?""
links.text: "What's a *briscade*?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Clearly not *you*. What do you wan..."
links.text: "Clearly not *you*. What do you want from me anyway?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's war time slang for an experien..."
links.text: It's war time slang for an experienced soldier of high rank. From the days of the Revolution in Revachol.

links.title: You: ""I'm looking at another windbag who..."
links.text: "I'm looking at another windbag who's got a problem with homo-sexuality."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Did I offend your moralist sensibi..."
links.text: "Did I offend your moralist sensibilities? You beat people to death with a baton, you fucking dog!" The old man spits.

links.title: You: ""Just put the gun down, okay? I don..."
links.text: "Just put the gun down, okay? I don't know how else to convince you."

links.title: You: ""Okay, you can keep it -- but keep..."
links.text: "Okay, you can keep it -- but keep the gun down while we talk."

links.title: You: ""Okay, but keep the gun down while..."
links.text: "Okay, but keep the gun down while we talk."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You *fasces* are pathetic when you..."
links.text: "You *fasces* are pathetic when you're alone..." He snorts. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's out of bullets." The old man..."
links.text: "It's out of bullets." The old man lays the rifle down, carelessly -- then stares at it, just lying there.

links.title: You: ""Kim?" (Turn to the lieutenant.)"
links.text: "Kim?" (Turn to the lieutenant.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant aims his pistol squa..."
links.text: The lieutenant aims his pistol square at the man's forehead.

links.title: You: ""One more time: what have you used..."
links.text: "One more time: what have you used this gun for?"

links.title: You: ""It's not wiped from the board. *I*..."
links.text: "It's not wiped from the board. *I* remember it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""They wouldn't like hearing their n..."
links.text: "They wouldn't like hearing their name in your mouth. A damn dog..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The time will come to win his trust..."
links.text: The time will come to win his trust, comrade. It is not now. You need to take care of the gun first.

links.title: You: "Assess his body language."
links.text: Assess his body language.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Wait! How did he get down there?"
links.text: Wait! How did he get down there?

links.title: You: ""How did you access the building? I..."
links.text: "How did you access the building? It's locked, at least now it is..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I didn't have to. Came in through..."
links.text: "I didn't have to. Came in through the storm drains."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Storm drains?""
links.text: "Storm drains?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""There used to be a system that con..."
links.text: "There used to be a system that connected the bunkers. Tunnels and such. Under the church and... everywhere. Most of them are gone now, collapsed -- just bricks. All the old infrastructure has..."

links.title: You: ""Storm drains?""
links.text: "Storm drains?"

links.title: You: "Not important."
links.text: Not important.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Are you sure? Forget about it then...."
links.text: Are you sure? Forget about it then...

links.title: You: ""Why don't you just walk there?""
links.text: "Why don't you just walk there?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I don't want to. They're all trait..."
links.text: "I don't want to. They're all traitors -- pigs, rabbits, and dogs. Men without ideals are only animals."

links.title: Empathy: "He does not want to see life moving..."
links.text: He does not want to see life moving on. People forgetting. Drinking. Laughing.

links.title: You: ""The weapons cache under Saint-Ghis..."
links.text: "The weapons cache under Saint-Ghislaine 22B." (Point to it.) "In the basement. Have you been there?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""So you finally found it." He looks..."
links.text: "So you finally found it." He looks at you -- then pulls the raincoat tighter around his neck. "There must have been a small squadron's worth of arms in there. Belle-Magraves, right?"

links.title: You: ""They were.""
links.text: "They were."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Useless now. Rusted away...""
links.text: "Useless now. Rusted away..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So you've been there?""
links.text: "So you've been there?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Sleeping..." He coughs. "Some nigh..."
links.text: "Sleeping..." He coughs. "Some nights. Ammo-scrounging on others. Those Magraves were shit even before they corroded -- some had bullets in the chamber, however."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "You *feel* the dots connecting. Lit..."
links.text: You *feel* the dots connecting. Little dots on the map he's walked across.

links.title: You: ""So you've been there?""
links.text: "So you've been there?"

links.title: You: ""They were damaged beyond use.""
links.text: "They were damaged beyond use."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I know.""
links.text: "I know."

links.title: You: ""There's a small bunker under the F..."
links.text: "There's a small bunker under the Feld building. Have you stayed there?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The propaganda bunker?" He coughs...."
links.text: "The propaganda bunker?" He coughs. "I used to, but not anymore."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Propaganda bunker?""
links.text: "Propaganda bunker?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""They stored leaflets there, broadc..."
links.text: "They stored leaflets there, broadcasting equipment too. Made broadcasts, I think. Propaganda officers... I buried them with their leaflets. They killed themselves. Two young boys."

links.title: You: ""Killed themselves?""
links.text: "Killed themselves?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""A lot of our boys did... I spent s..."
links.text: "A lot of our boys did... I spent some winters there. Never liked it. Kept thinking of them..." He stares at the ruins of the Feld building. "No need to go underground anymore. It's better in the ruins on the ground."

links.title: You: ""Propaganda bunker?""
links.text: "Propaganda bunker?"

links.title: You: ""One more question -- do you smoke..."
links.text: "One more question -- do you smoke Tioumoutiri cigarettes?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I do." He coughs."
links.text: "I do." He coughs.

links.title: You: ""Ever smoke them on the mainland?"..."
links.text: "Ever smoke them on the mainland?" (Point to Land's End.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""They're good." He nods. "Plenty of..."
links.text: "They're good." He nods. "Plenty of tar. I like that boy on the pack too. Reminds me of the last century."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant exchanges a quick gl..."
links.text: The lieutenant exchanges a quick glance with you, then turns to the man...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you go to Martinaise often thes..."
links.text: "Do you go to Martinaise often these days?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Hey..." The kid must have some ide..."
links.text: "Hey..." The kid must have some idea. "You go to Martinaise lately? Cuno hasn't seen you around..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Only when my health permits." He s..."
links.text: "Only when my health permits." He shrugs. "I check my old haunts..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Like the secret route in the Whirli..."
links.text: Like the secret route in the Whirling-in-Rags? This is one for later. When you really need it.

links.title: You: ""Tell me another thing..." (Conclud..."
links.text: "Tell me another thing..." (Conclude.)

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man looks across the water:..."
links.text: The old man looks across the water: at the city, the ruins, the motorways rising above it...

links.title: You: ""Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you're und..."
links.text: "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you're under arrest for the murder of the colonel."

links.title: You: "(Now we are done.) "Iosef Lilianovi..."
links.text: (Now we are done.) "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you are under arrest for the murder of the colonel."

links.title: You: ""I have trouble remembering things..."
links.text: "I have trouble remembering things too."

links.title: The Deserter: "He squints and looks you straight i..."
links.text: He squints and looks you straight in the eye -- two black beads, moist from the sea air.

links.title: Half Light: "Embers going out."
links.text: Embers going out.

links.title: You: ""That's it for now, old man. Stay p..."
links.text: "That's it for now, old man. Stay put." [Leave.]

links.title: The Deserter: ""I ain't going anywhere.""
links.text: "I ain't going anywhere."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I ain't going anywhere.""
links.text: "I ain't going anywhere."

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""Minions of capital," he spits. "Wh..."
dialogueTree.text: "Minions of capital," he spits. "What do you want?"

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""Minion of capital." He spits. "Wha..."
dialogueTree.text: "Minion of capital." He spits. "What do you want?"

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: "The old man leans on the frame stoc..."
dialogueTree.text: The old man leans on the frame stock of his rifle, looking up at you.

links.title: You: ""You don't like this uniform?" (Ges..."
links.text: "You don't like this uniform?" (Gesture toward your coat.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Oh, I love it. Makes me nostalgic..."
links.text: "Oh, I love it. Makes me nostalgic for the time we..." He pauses for a moment, catching his breath.

links.title: The Deserter: ""The time we wiped every last fucki..."
links.text: "The time we wiped every last fucking one of them off this Earth."

links.title: Half Light: "Grand, violent pride swells in him."
links.text: Grand, violent pride swells in him.

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh yeah... that's hard core, Cuno'..."
links.text: "Oh yeah... that's hard core, Cuno's gonna like this."

links.title: Empathy: "Pride of the "at least we have this..."
links.text: Pride of the "at least we have this" kind. This is a cracked honour, a bitter pride. The man sounds like a *communard*. Be careful.

links.title: You: ""Are you the *fire-guy*?""
links.text: "Are you the *fire-guy*?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The what now?" He cups his ear. "I..."
links.text: "The what now?" He cups his ear. "I can't hear you."

links.title: You: ""Did you recently tell two kids to..."
links.text: "Did you recently tell two kids to put out their fire? Two twins."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I may have. All sorts of little ra..."
links.text: "I may have. All sorts of little rats have come sniffing around, trying to give up the position..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The *position*? Sounds like a hidin..."
links.text: The *position*? Sounds like a hiding place...

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Fire-guy..." He shakes his head. "..."
links.text: "Fire-guy..." He shakes his head. "Regressive bourgeoisie henchman. Can't even talk like a grown up."

links.title: You: ""You've retained your eyesight.""
links.text: "You've retained your eyesight."

links.title: The Deserter: ""My eyesight?" He clears his throat..."
links.text: "My eyesight?" He clears his throat. "Yes. Helps me see all the shit."

links.title: Half Light: "A shudder of disgust passes his rig..."
links.text: A shudder of disgust passes his right side. His left side remains motionless.

links.title: You: ""Did you close the blast door?""
links.text: "Did you close the blast door?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I did," he breathes out with a whe..."
links.text: "I did," he breathes out with a wheeze. "And you opened it -- how?"

links.title: You: ""I fuelled the generator. Then used..."
links.text: "I fuelled the generator. Then used the console."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I should've burned that console do..."
links.text: "I should've burned that console down..." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""How did you know I was coming?""
links.text: "How did you know I was coming?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Reactionary rock-and-roll music."..."
links.text: "Reactionary rock-and-roll music." He gestures north. "Playing on the water."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Told you we shouldn't play Sad FM.""
links.text: "Told you we shouldn't play Sad FM."

links.title: You: ""You didn't say that, Cuno. You wer..."
links.text: "You didn't say that, Cuno. You weren't even on the boat."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fucking old man... couldn't keep h..."
links.text: "Fucking old man... couldn't keep his rock in..." he whispers, agitated.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Technically this wasn't traditional..."
links.text: Technically this wasn't traditional rock. It was more *independent melodic*.

links.title: You: ""That wasn't even ordinary rock, it..."
links.text: "That wasn't even ordinary rock, it was..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Ssssssh! You're making us look lik..."
links.text: "Ssssssh! You're making us look like shit."

links.title: You: ""But you didn't say that, Kim.""
links.text: "But you didn't say that, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I did.""
links.text: "I did."

links.title: Rhetoric: "We have entered a world where he sa..."
links.text: We have entered a world where he said you shouldn't. It is the only world.

links.title: You: ""It was not rock-and-roll. It was S..."
links.text: "It was not rock-and-roll. It was Sad FM!"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Sad FM, huh? I always hated that s..."
links.text: "Sad FM, huh? I always hated that station. Phlegmatic, counter-revolutionary dirges... Sadness is a mental illness, a weapon of the bourgeoisie."

links.title: You: ""It was not reactionary. It was coo..."
links.text: "It was not reactionary. It was cool."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The fascists were right about rock..."
links.text: "The fascists were right about rock-and-roll. It *is* degenerate... Hip-gyrating mental illness music."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Cuno: ""I told you not to play shitty rock.""
links.text: "I told you not to play shitty rock."

links.title: You: ""Nice gun you got there.""
links.text: "Nice gun you got there."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's not nice, it's a piece of shi..."
links.text: "It's not nice, it's a piece of shit." He shrugs. "But it gets the job done."

links.title: You: ""Is that a Belle-Magrave?""
links.text: "Is that a Belle-Magrave?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's a Triangong 4-46.""
links.text: "It's a Triangong 4-46."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Southeast Samaran-made. Exotic. Mus..."
links.text: Southeast Samaran-made. Exotic. Must be defunct too. No modern rifle manufacturer of that name springs to mind.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A Samaran rifle... How did you get..."
links.text: "A Samaran rifle... How did you get hold of one?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It was sent to us by our brothers..."
links.text: "It was sent to us by our brothers in the Hsin-Yao Commune. Military aid." He pats the rifle.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It has stayed true to him. He can s..."
links.text: It has stayed true to him. He can still make it sing.

links.title: Cuno: ""Whoa... massive gun." Cuno looks a..."
links.text: "Whoa... massive gun." Cuno looks at the weapon.

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's actually quite light. It was..."
links.text: "It's actually quite light. It was sent to us by our brothers in the Hsin-Yao Commune. Military aid." He pats the rifle.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It has stayed true to him. He can s..."
links.text: It has stayed true to him. He can still make it sing.

links.title: You: ""A Samaran-made rifle.""
links.text: "A Samaran-made rifle."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Military aid," he pats the rifle,..."
links.text: "Military aid," he pats the rifle, "from our brothers in the Hsin-Yao Commune."

links.title: You: ""How did you get hold of it?""
links.text: "How did you get hold of it?"

links.title: You: ""What make of rifle is that, exactl..."
links.text: "What make of rifle is that, exactly?"

links.title: You: ""The Hsin-Yao Commune?""
links.text: "The Hsin-Yao Commune?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""You heard me. It's good now. Like..."
links.text: "You heard me. It's good now. Like chalk wiped from the board." His gaze turns inwards.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "He's right. Almost no one remembers..."
links.text: He's right. Almost no one remembers there was a third metastasis of the World Revolution, in the Safre Empire, extinguished in '06.

links.title: You: "Let it vanish."
links.text: Let it vanish.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's almost as if they were never t..."
links.text: It's almost as if they were never there. Only the rifle remains, cradled by the old man.

links.title: You: ""Your weapon has stayed true to you..."
links.text: "Your weapon has stayed true to you. Mine has stayed true to me too." (Put your hand on your belt.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes, I bet you've killed a lot of..."
links.text: "Yes, I bet you've killed a lot of people with it..." His eyes narrow. "...you fascist *fuck*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Have you come to make me one of th..."
links.text: "Have you come to make me one of them?" His grip on the rifle tightens.

links.title: Composure: "His right eye twitches -- with what..."
links.text: His right eye twitches -- with what? Fear? Rage?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have *come* to ask you question..."
links.text: "We have *come* to ask you questions, nothing more." The lieutenant puts his hand on his holster.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you do not comply, we will take..."
links.text: "If you do not comply, we will take you in. Do you understand?"

links.title: The Deserter: "Another spitball lands in the ashes..."
links.text: Another spitball lands in the ashes. That's all the answer he gives.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck yeah, this is happening," he..."
links.text: "Fuck yeah, this is happening," he comments breathlessly, in awe of the potential violence implied.

links.title: Half Light: "He's high off the fear."
links.text: He's high off the fear.

links.title: Composure: "Like an untrained fighter he leans..."
links.text: Like an untrained fighter he leans forward, back hunched, ready to spring.

links.title: Half Light: "The danger levels here are hard to..."
links.text: The danger levels here are hard to read. One moment he's a fire, the next -- a fire gone out.

links.title: You: "i wanna see phasmid with kim"
links.text: i wanna see phasmid with kim

links.title: You: ""You couldn't give up.""
links.text: "You couldn't give up."

links.title: The Deserter: "He nods."
links.text: He nods.

links.title: Volition: "But he can now."
links.text: But he can now.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What have you been doing during al..."
links.text: "What have you been doing during all this time?"

links.title: You: ""What have you been doing all this..."
links.text: "What have you been doing all this time?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Hiding, fishing, waiting..." He lo..."
links.text: "Hiding, fishing, waiting..." He looks across the water.

links.title: Shivers: "Where night falls... Hydrogen stree..."
links.text: Where night falls... Hydrogen streetlamps burn on Rue de Saint-Ghislaine, golden light casting black shadows. Further inland, in Jamrock, the street grid appears black -- unlit avenue after unlit avenue. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two police officers step out of the..."
links.text: Two police officers step out of the Whirling-in-Rags cafeteria. Satellite-Officer Jean Vicquemare inspects a series of burnt black letters splashed across the plaza mosaic.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Patrol Officer Judit Minot points w..."
links.text: Patrol Officer Judit Minot points west. "The fishing village..." She glances at her watch. "We meet in 15 minutes. It's a ten minute walk."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The officers go, leaving behind the..."
links.text: The officers go, leaving behind the writing -- still smouldering. ONE DAY, it says, I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Always waiting." The old man turns..."
links.text: "Always waiting." The old man turns his eyes from the shore and back to you.

links.title: You: ""For what?""
links.text: "For what?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""For her to return.""
links.text: "For her to return."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her, who?""
links.text: "Her, who?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Girl Child Revolution.""
links.text: "Girl Child Revolution."

links.title: You: ""Girl Child Revolution?""
links.text: "Girl Child Revolution?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Always...""
links.text: "Always..."

links.title: You: ""I'm afraid she's gone.""
links.text: "I'm afraid she's gone."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The material base for an uprising..."
links.text: "The material base for an uprising has eroded." He nods and blinks his black eyes. "The working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The historic opportunity for a rev..."
