links.text: "The historic opportunity for a revolution has passed. It will not come back anymore. However hard I try, whatever I do."

links.title: Conceptualization: "So that's why he's 'the deserter.'"
links.text: So that's why he's 'the deserter.'

links.title: You: ""Once a deserter, always a deserter.""
links.text: "Once a deserter, always a deserter."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I have done everything a man can d..."
links.text: "I have done everything a man can do. What have *you* done?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We keep people alive. We help them..."
links.text: "We keep people alive. We help them survive, whatever the ideological situation. Day in and day out."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Survive?" The old man spits into t..."
links.text: "Survive?" The old man spits into the dead fire. "For *what*?"

links.title: You: "Don't say it."
links.text: Don't say it.

links.title: The Deserter: ""What *can* I do?" The old man sudd..."
links.text: "What *can* I do?" The old man suddenly looks around, suddenly confused.

links.title: Suggestion: "What *has* he done? Perhaps a confe..."
links.text: What *has* he done? Perhaps a confession will lighten the load...

links.title: You: ""What *have* you done then?""
links.text: "What *have* you done then?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- what? To get things going a..."
links.text: "Yes -- what? To get things going again..." The lieutenant steps closer. "Fan the flame?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""There is no flame to fan." He star..."
links.text: "There is no flame to fan." He stares right through at him, blinking his dark eyes. "There is nothing left -- of the world, of our dreams."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I just *mourn*." He stares right t..."
links.text: "I just *mourn*." He stares right through you. Then blinks again.

links.title: You: "This is not the time to push."
links.text: This is not the time to push.

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man suddenly looks around,..."
links.text: The old man suddenly looks around, confused. "What *can* I do? What is there..."

links.title: You: ""She better come. I too have given..."
links.text: "She better come. I too have given my life to Mazovian socio-economics."

links.title: The Deserter: ""A waste." He blinks his black eyes..."
links.text: "A waste." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: You: ""I dare not dream anymore.""
links.text: "I dare not dream anymore."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Good." He blinks his black eyes. "..."
links.text: "Good." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: You: ""Nothing in history is guaranteed...."
links.text: "Nothing in history is guaranteed. But revolution is still a possibility."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No." He blinks his black eyes. "Th..."
links.text: "No." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: You: ""I come from there." (Point to the..."
links.text: "I come from there." (Point to the mainland.) "I can assure you, that is *not* what the people are planning."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I am not a fool." He blinks his bl..."
links.text: "I am not a fool." He blinks his black eyes. "I know -- the material base for an uprising has eroded. The working class has betrayed mankind..."

links.title: You: ""I've been there. The city is a tin..."
links.text: "I've been there. The city is a tinderbox. It may still happen."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It won't." He blinks his black eye..."
links.text: "It won't." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: You: ""I've seen it." (Shake your head.)..."
links.text: "I've seen it." (Shake your head.) "Capital is too powerful. The rich are very well organized."

links.title: The Deserter: ""They have *you*." He blinks his bl..."
links.text: "They have *you*." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: You: ""Women will always betray you.""
links.text: "Women will always betray you."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Women *are* more susceptible to bo..."
links.text: "Women *are* more susceptible to bourgeois morals." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: You: ""Girl Child Nation is too strong fo..."
links.text: "Girl Child Nation is too strong for that."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No -- this is a vulgar criticism."..."
links.text: "No -- this is a vulgar criticism." He blinks his black eyes. "The material base for an uprising has eroded, the working class has betrayed mankind and themselves..."

links.title: You: ""Her, who?""
links.text: "Her, who?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Always waiting. Always....""
links.text: "Always waiting. Always...."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two police officers step out of the..."
links.text: Two police officers step out of the Whirling-in-Rags cafeteria. Satellite-Officer Jean Vicquemare inspects giant letters across the plaza mosaic, in dark red government-marked heavy fuel oil.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Patrol Officer Judit Minot points w..."
links.text: Patrol Officer Judit Minot points west. "The fishing village..." She glances at her watch. "We meet in 15 minutes. It's a ten minute walk."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The officers go, leaving behind the..."
links.text: The officers go, leaving behind the writing, still smelling of petroleum. ONE DAY, it says, I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE.

links.title: Shivers: "Where it's morning. On Rue de Saint..."
links.text: Where it's morning. On Rue de Saint-Ghislaine, people are walking, the gas streetlights have already been switched off. Further inland, in Jamrock, the streets come alive with workers: men, women, children rushing -- muddy avenue after muddy avenue. The temperature is rising. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

links.title: Shivers: "Where the afternoon grows late. On..."
links.text: Where the afternoon grows late. On Rue de Saint-Ghislaine people walk home, streetlights will soon be lit. Further inland the streets are alive with workers: men, women, children. Streethawks and migrant labourers. The temperature is steady. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

links.title: Shivers: "Where evening comes. On Rue de Sain..."
links.text: Where evening comes. On Rue de Saint-Ghislaine hydrogen streetlights switch on, casting black shadows. Further inland, the street grid appears dark -- unlit avenue after unlit avenue. The temperature is dropping. Altocumulus clouds form above Precinct 41.

links.title: You: "i wanna see phasmid with cuno"
links.text: i wanna see phasmid with cuno

links.title: You: ""Sir, I need you to put down that g..."
links.text: "Sir, I need you to put down that gun so we can talk further. I'm with the police." (Proceed.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pulls his pistol fro..."
links.text: The lieutenant pulls his pistol from the holster.

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're a glorified night-watchman...."
links.text: "You're a glorified night-watchman." He looks you in the eye. "This is a service rifle. I can only lay it down before an enemy commander of corresponding rank."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "His elbows rest on the frame stock,..."
links.text: His elbows rest on the frame stock, calmly for now, but he may still get it in his hands. Looks like he knows the weapon...

links.title: Interfacing: "You don't see a magazine in the wel..."
links.text: You don't see a magazine in the well.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Yell at him, now! LOUD!"
links.text: Yell at him, now! LOUD!

links.title: Interfacing: "There does not seem to be a magazin..."
links.text: There does not seem to be a magazine in the well...  the rifle's side is clearly visible.

links.title: You: ""I'm with the police. You can keep..."
links.text: "I'm with the police. You can keep the gun, but keep it down. Not *one* move." (Proceed.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." The lieutenant aims his pisto..."
links.text: "No." The lieutenant aims his pistol square at the man's head and says:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Put it down *now*, sir.""
links.text: "Put it down *now*, sir."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Or you're gonna blow my brains out..."
links.text: "Or you're gonna blow my brains out before you question me?" There's a moment's silence. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's out of bullets." The old man..."
links.text: "It's out of bullets." The old man lays the rifle down, carelessly, then looks at it lying there.

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck?!" Cuno's looking at you..."
links.text: "The fuck?!" Cuno's looking at you like you just shat yourself.

links.title: Cuno: ""No fucking way, not on Cuno's life..."
links.text: "No fucking way, not on Cuno's life..." he mumbles. With his finger pointing at the deserter -- through his jacket pocket -- the kid turns to the old man.

links.title: Cuno: ""Officer Cuno's got his Kiejl A9 po..."
links.text: "Officer Cuno's got his Kiejl A9 pointed at your fucking head and he's gonna blow it clean off if you don't drop your weapon right now!" His pointed finger is moving inside his pocket.

links.title: Drama: "Even with the intensity he's puttin..."
links.text: Even with the intensity he's putting in those words, and the fidgeting in his pocket, the kid is unconvincing.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Disarmed by a kid..." He smiles to..."
links.text: "Disarmed by a kid..." He smiles to himself. "To hell with it. It's a walking stick anyway."

links.title: Drama: "Not in a million years does he beli..."
links.text: Not in a million years does he believe Cuno is armed. Perhaps it's the best end he can hope for?

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yeah-yeah, one move and you'll kil..."
links.text: "Yeah-yeah, one move and you'll kill me. Put me against the wall..." He sighs. "To hell with it, it's a walking stick anyway."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It's out of bullets." He lays the..."
links.text: "It's out of bullets." He lays the rifle down, slowly. Then just looks at it lying there.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Like an amputated limb in the sand."
links.text: Like an amputated limb in the sand.

links.title: Conceptualization: "He stares on, his wrinkled mouth mo..."
links.text: He stares on, his wrinkled mouth moving without a sound -- a strange sadness, like a song.

links.title: You: ""What did you say?""
links.text: "What did you say?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The future teaches you to be alone.""
links.text: "The future teaches you to be alone."

links.title: Conceptualization: "The present..."
links.text: The present...

links.title: You: ""The present...""
links.text: "The present..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The present to be afraid and cold...."
links.text: "The present to be afraid and cold." The old man pulls back the hood of his plastic cape and looks up into the sky. It's blue grey, the same colour as the sea.

links.title: You: "Let him say it."
links.text: Let him say it.

links.title: You: "Let it be."
links.text: Let it be.

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man pulls back the hood of..."
links.text: The old man pulls back the hood of his plastic cape and looks up into the sky.

links.title: You: ""Sorry for disturbing you. Good bye.""
links.text: "Sorry for disturbing you. Good bye."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Fucking clowns..." He squeezes his..."
links.text: "Fucking clowns..." He squeezes his eyelids shut and shakes his head slowly.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""I shoulda known they'd send the fu..."
links.text: "I shoulda known they'd send the fucking clowns for me..." You hear him mumble to the blackened logs.

links.title: Authority: "That was not the right move. You sh..."
links.text: That was not the right move. You should have pushed on.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Fucking clown..." He squeezes his..."
links.text: "Fucking clown..." He squeezes his eyelids shut and shakes his head slowly.

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: "An old man wearing tracksuit trouse..."
dialogueTree.text: An old man wearing tracksuit trousers leans on the frame stock of his rifle. He gathers a big ball of spit in his mouth...

links.title: The Deserter: "...then spits it out into the extin..."
links.text: ...then spits it out into the extinguished fire before him. He raises his black eyes, hooded by creased eyelids, to meet yours.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Unclouded by cataracts -- his eyesi..."
links.text: Unclouded by cataracts -- his eyesight is sharp.

links.title: Empathy: "He's practically tearing up from sp..."
links.text: He's practically tearing up from spite. Hatred got the best of him a long time ago. This man hates everything.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Loyalist clown uniform..." He clea..."
links.text: "Loyalist clown uniform..." He clears his throat, pointing at your coat. "I see they sent the full *fasces*. Royal treatment."
